mapper.select: SELECT apt_code, build_year, road_name, road_name_bonbun, road_name_bubun, road_name_seq, road_name_basement_code, road_name_code, dong, bonbun, bubun, si_gun_gu_code, eub_myun_dong_code, dong_code, land_code, apartment_name, jibun, lng, lat FROM houseinfo WHERE lng BETWEEN #{lngFrom} AND #{lngTo} AND lat BETWEEN #{latFrom} AND #{latTo}
